next set of words will be I'm going to oversimplify here for the sake of Simplicity but think about this as a little bit like the autoc complete when you start typing something in and then it predicts like that uh or if someone's losing their voice then you could capture their voice and then they'd be able to type and you'd be able to hear it in their voice but there's also a lot of cases where $learning_note.value: The video, accessible at [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qYNweeDHiyU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qYNweeDHiyU), explores the distinctions and interconnections between artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning, and deep learning, while also addressing the rise of generative AI technologies. It begins by defining AI as the simulation of human intelligence through computers, highlighting its evolution from early expert systems to modern applications. The video then delves into machine learning, emphasizing its ability to identify patterns and make predictions without explicit programming, and deep learning, which uses neural networks to mimic brain functions. The discussion extends to generative AI, including large language models and deep fakes, illustrating their capacity to create new content and their impact on AI adoption. The video underscores the transformative role of foundation models in accelerating AI's integration into various sectors.
